title: Wagoner vintage ornate typeface
content:
Here is another one giving us trouble

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121235im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wag_6456.jpg)
author: evan

comments.content: Is this as old as it looks Evan? If so, it may be that the closest you can get would be [Paul Lloyd's](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121235/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/index.htm) Birmingham family - which sure appears to be based on the same lettering.

Sorry to reply to such an ancient thread, but this is actually Birmingham Sans:

[http://www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/reprise/birmingham.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121235/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/reprise/birmingham.htm "http://www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/reprise/birmingham.htm")

-part of a collection called 'Reprise!" made when I revisited some of my earlier designs...

Paul Lloyd.
